details.description: GUIDE.md was missing documentation for the core public methods (addState, start, transition, getCurrent, getHistory, onTransition, canTransition, reset, getStates) exposed by StateMachine.
GUIDE.md did not describe the exported interfaces (StateDefinition, TransitionEvent) and the TransitionHook type, making it hard to understand expected shapes.
GUIDE.md lacked a complete, runnable code example demonstrating how to wire up a StateMachine, register states, and handle transitions.
